title: Golden Spike National Historic Site: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    May 10   7 Photos  Photos of the activities connected with the anniversary celebration.          Railroaders' Festival   7 Photos  Photos of the annual family fun celebration.          Locomotives   7 Photos  The Jupiter and 119 are the fully funcitional steam locomotives that operate at Golden Spike National Historic Site. These locomotives are replicas of the original locomotives that were present for the ceremony in 1869.            Winter Steam Festival   18 Photos  Each year between Christmas and New Year Golden Spike gives visitors an opportunity to see one of the locomotives in action during the colder winter season.          Wildlife   10 Photos  Photos of some of the amazing wildlife that frequent Golden Spike National Historic Site.          WNPA New Arrivals   3 Photos  Some of the new items available for purchase at the Western National Parks Association Bookstore.
